Name: project_budget_limit
Description: The total project cost must not exceed the budget

Name: sprint_duration_limit
Description: The duration of a daily scrum must be exactly 15 minutes

Name: worker_availability_limit
Description: No single worker's availability can be below 50%

Name: team_size_minimum
Description: A team must have at least 3 members

Name: team_size_maximum
Description: A team must have at most 9 members

Name: story_points_per_sprint
Description: The total story points in a sprint backlog cannot exceed the team's velocity

Name: feature_priority_threshold
Description: Only features with priority 'High' or 'Medium' can be in the next release

Name: blocker_must_be_resolved
Description: Any blocker with 'Critical' severity must have a resolution date set

Name: sprint_goal_must_be_defined
Description: Every sprint must have exactly one defined goal

Name: scrum_master_present
Description: A sprint retrospective must be moderated by a Scrum Master
